snippet: In their closing arguments at the trial of former President Hosni Mubarak of Egypt, prosecutors said he was ultimately responsible for the killings of hundreds of peaceful protesters.
abstract: Egyptian prosecutors, in their closing arguments at the historic trial of former President Hosni Mubarak, call for hanging the disgraced head of state, saying his authority over the security forces made him responsible for the deaths of hundreds of protesters who challenged his rule.
lead_paragraph: In their closing arguments at the trial of former President Hosni Mubarak of Egypt, prosecutors said he was ultimately responsible for the killings of hundreds of peaceful protesters.

headline.seo: Egyptian Prosecutors Say Mubarak Should Be Hanged
headline.main: Prosecutors in Egypt Call for Mubarak to Be Hanged
headline.print_headline: In Closing Arguments, Egypt Prosecutors Say Mubarak Should Be Hanged
